name: wud
tagline: A Docker image update watcher and notifier
description: wud is a self-hosted Docker image watcher that monitors registries and running containers, notifying you about new image versions. It helps keep services up to date with minimal manual checking.

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Automatically detect running Docker containers and track their image versions

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Send alerts via email, Slack, Discord, or webhooks when updates are available

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Compare running container versions against latest available tags in registries

features.title: Tag Filtering
features.description: Configure which image tags to watch using regex patterns or specific version ranges

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: See all containers and their update status in a centralized web interface
